item.description:
Join members of the South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group as we start our Cooking Classes!  Debbi has dozens of cookbooks with thousands of recipes, loves to cook and is willing to share her talents with us.  This will be a fun way to learn how to cook new recipes, taste them and socialize!  We may even plan an item that we will make next month at tonight's Cooking Class.  

 

Today we will be making something that you suggested on the "Cooking Classes!" Discussion Thread.  We will peruse the replies and do our best to pick from the suggestions of those who have RSVPed Yes thus far.  We will update with more details about a week before the event. Click on the following link to be taken to the Discussion Thread to post your suggestions.  Please let us know what types of foods you would like to learn to cook by posting in the Talk About It Section (at the bottom of this page) or on the Discussion Thread (by clicking on the link here).  http://www.meetup.com/ssdomg/messages/boards/thread/17992182  

 

Let us know your general availability for our monthly Cooking Classes by clicking on the following link to vote in the Poll.  http://www.meetup.com/ssdomg/polls/420042/

 

Class Details:

*All of the food will be purchased ahead of time by the Event Organizers.  Cost will be approximately $10-$15 per person (excluding Debbi) plus any applicable Event Fees.  Please bring cash.  (This is very inexpensive compared to most cooking classes and dinners!)

*Please let us know in your RSVP Comments if you have a Food Allergy.  We will make sure we exclude that from whatever we cook.

*After we prepare and cook we will dine and sample our creations.

*We will provide a copy of all recipes for everyone to take home with them.

*Please bring 1-2 (one to two) 1-serving (one serving) containers.  We will do our best to send everyone home with at least one serving.  Please Note: There may be leftovers for some items but not others.

*Normally, we have an attendance requirement.  However, we are experimenting with this month's Cooking Class and there is no attendance requirement!  However, if there is overwhelming interest we may reserve the right to impose some sort of attendance requirement so be sure to RSVP early.

 

Join us for a few hours of fun, food, friends and learning to cook and enjoy some new foods!

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 

April Cooking Class & Meal

Saturday, April 14th @ 5-9pm (approximate end time +/- 1/2 hr)

Debbi's Home

Quincy, MA

Phone #: To be emailed with directions to Yes RSVPs at or shortly after the RSVP Deadline.

 

Menu

Simple Salad

Lemon Risotto with Shrimp

Salted Caramel Chocolate Chip Cookie Bars

 

Meeting Place: Inside Debbi's apartment.

Organizers: Angela and Debbi (2011 & 2012 AM)

Cost: Between $10-$15, TBD @ Event based on cost of Food & # of Attendees (minus Debbi)

Event Fee: [Current 2012] Annual Members - FREE, Members - $2 each; $12 to become a 2012 Annual Member

Min/Max: Minimum of 5 by Tuesday, April 3rd.  Maximum of 8.  These numbers include the Event Organizers

Guests: 1 Guest allowed per Member who has attended at least 3 events w/ the SSDOMG.

RSVP Deadline: 8pm on Friday, April 13th. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by an Event Organizer prior to the event.  In addition, we will be buying the food based on the # of Yes RSVPs.  Absolutely no RSVP changes will be allowed after 10am on Saturday.

Please bring cash. You are responsible for your portion of the bill including drinks, food, shared food, tax, and tip.  This has been the SSDOMG's policy for over 5 years now and it helps avoid confusion when paying the bill.

Inclement Weather:  This event takes place rain, snow or shine.  In the case of an extreme weather forecast we will update this information around the RSVP Deadline.  Please check back here for further information.

Please see the Pages for more information about the SSDOMG's policies and procedures which help ensure a smoother, relaxed, fun dining experience for everyone.

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions: Will be emailed to Yes RSVPs shortly after the RSVP deadline.
item.how_to_find_us: We will give the Yes RSVPs directions right to Debbi's door.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: April Cooking Class & Meal
